example.title: Hello world!
example.subtitle: This is a text in Portuguese (pt-BR)
example.description:
In recent years, web development has evolved significantly, and the demand for efficient and scalable applications has increased.
To meet this need, we created a boilerplate project that combines Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI, and Firebase. This stack enables developers to quickly and effectively build modern web applications.

Next.js is a powerful React framework that offers server-side rendering and static site generation. It enhances performance and SEO, making it an excellent choice for developers. Tailwind CSS, in turn, is a utility-first CSS framework that allows rapid user interface development with a focus on customization and responsiveness. Shadcn UI complements this by providing pre-designed components that are easy to integrate and customize.

Aceternity is another UI component library that stands out for its ability to create impressive and interactive visual experiences. Like Shadcn UI, Aceternity offers a collection of pre-designed components that facilitate building modern and responsive interfaces. However, what sets Aceternity apart is its integration with Framer, allowing developers to create 3D and perspective UI elements. This innovative approach enriches the user experience, providing dynamic interactions and visually appealing designs.

Firebase serves as the backend solution, offering real-time database features, authentication, and hosting. By leveraging Firebase, developers can focus on building features without worrying about server management. This boilerplate project serves as a solid foundation for anyone looking to start their journey in web development with these modern technologies.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description:
We are a company committed to providing solutions for the energy cable and conductor industry, with equipment and services that ensure the efficiency and continuity of your operations.

With decades of market experience, we manufacture high-performance equipment to meet the customized demands of energy conductor cable manufacturers.

Our commitment goes beyond manufacturing. We offer technical support and specialized maintenance, ensuring that your equipment is always in full operation, minimizing downtime and maximizing your business's productivity. We know that each industry has unique challenges, which is why we develop personalized solutions to meet the specific needs of each client.

our_departments.title: Our Departments
our_departments.engineering_description: Our engineering department is responsible for developing innovative solutions, designing equipment and systems that meet the specific needs of each client, ensuring high efficiency and quality.
our_departments.machining_description:
Our Machining department is dedicated to manufacturing high-precision parts using CNC machining centers, CNC lathes, conventional machines, and state-of-the-art equipment. We handle everything from small demands to complex and custom projects, always focusing on quality, efficiency, and strict deadlines.

Our expertise guarantees solutions that meet the highest standards, from development to final production, with special attention to detail and finishing.
our_departments.assembly_description:
We integrate mechanical and electronic components, delivering complete and customized systems.

Our qualified team performs the assembly of devices, machines, and high-complexity equipment, always ensuring the perfect interaction between the components. We ensure that each solution delivered operates efficiently, safely, and in accordance with the technical standards required by the market.

hero.title: We Move the Industry
hero.description: In the industry, every second counts. We offer complete solutions to ensure that your operation never stops.

service.subtitle: Customized Industrial Solutions for Your Business
service.manufacturing_description: We provide specialized machines and equipment for various industrial sectors, such as sawmills, the graphic industry, and oil refining.
service.rent_description: We offer rental of commercial and industrial machines and equipment without an operator, suitable for various needs.
service.maintenance_description: We provide maintenance and repair services for industrial machines, ensuring maximum efficiency and longevity of the equipment.
service.development_description: We develop customized industrial projects, from planning to execution, ensuring innovative and efficient solutions for your business.
